message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this product for $15,000. I believe it will be incredibly valuable for you.
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer but $15,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your budget constraints, but $8,500 is significantly less than what it's worth to me.  How about we meet in the middle at $12,000?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $12,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $9,500.  This is the absolute most I can afford at this time.
